entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
